2.0.8.5: Fixed:import first image from csv column and skip other images in case of multi images provided for featured image import
2.0.8.8: Fixed:acf image gallery import support via image name
2.0.8.9: Fixed:yoast seo facebook, twitter image fields import issue
2.0.8.10: Changed:featured image text to image url for media images import
2.0.8.12: Fixed:taxonomies, custom post type view log issue
2.0.8.13: Fixed:removed deactivated plugin custom fields from mapping
2.0.8.14: Added:pods relationship import support for user
2.0.8.16: Fixed:yoast seo, rankmath fields import issue
